roleset.name: for medical diseases and disorders without rolesets

role.descr: affected body part, only if in addition to ARG2

example.amr: (h / history-01 :li 2 :ARG2 (d / disease-disorder :name (n2 / name :op1 "neutropenia") :ARG2-of (h2 / have-disorder-91 :implicit +) :ARG1-of (r / relate-01 :ARG2 (c / chemotherapy-01))))
